Posts.Content: shar1225 wrote: Daughter age 40 was told in July 2010 she had IDC 5mm neg nodes. She has excisiobal biopsy. Week later lumpectomy got close margins so the next week andother surgery for better margins. Today she went in today for stimulation for rads. Is lump & rads standard treatment for this type of IDC. Also on tamoxifen. Shar (Daughters Diag) Dx 7/24/2010, IDC, <1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Sep 22, 2010 12:58PM shar1225 wrote: Daughters was 5mm tumor, grade 1, no node. Ask if she needed to do OncoTypeDx test and Dr said was not needed. Do you think she should request test to be done. She starts Rads next Wed.
